title: Note 20 Ultra review: big phone, small updates
description: Samsung's Galaxy Note 20 has nearly every top-end spec you could ask for on an Android phone, including a massive 6.9-inch high refresh rate 120Hz screen. The camera system fixes what was wrong with the S20 Ultra. And Samsung Notes is ...really good? It's really good, especially with the S Pen stylus.
